category: Gyeonggi player registration regulations/Article 8 (Application for registration)
contents: Article 8 (Registration Application) ① A person who wishes to register as an athlete shall apply for registration with the relevant city/provincial sports organization as determined by the relevant member sports organization. However, in the following cases, member sports organizations do this. 1. If there is no relevant city/provincial sports organization 2. Registration of referee ② Anyone wishing to register as a player must submit a registration application, sports human rights pledge, and consent form in accordance with the Personal Information Protection Act through the registration system. If necessary, member sport organizations may separately request documents required for registration. Revised on January 24, 2022. ③ If a person who wishes to register as an athlete is unable to verify his/her identity for any of the reasons below, he/she must submit a statement of explanation and the documents referred to in Paragraph 2 to the city/provincial sports organization, and the city/provincial sports organization shall register. You can confirm the applicant and submit the registration application. 1. If you do not have a mobile phone in your name 2. If you do not have a legal representative 3. If you cannot receive an i-PIN 4. If you cannot verify your identity for other reasons ​ Revised on January 24, 2022
